chapter.text: 27|1|ttwa ssin igeosdeul-eun kkulan-ui jeollo sasil-eul balghyeojuneun seongseoimyeo
27|2|midneun jadeul-eul wihan gil-iyo bog eum-ila
27|3|igeos-eun yebaeleul deuligo iseullam seleul bachimyeo naeseleul hwagsinhaneun ja deul-eul wihan geos-ila
27|4|naeseleul midji anihan jadeul-ui haeng-wideul-i geuleoldeushage boige hamae geudeul-eun banghwanghayeoss-euni
27|5|gahoghan jingbeol-i geudeul-ege iss-eul geos-imyeo naeseeseoneun gajang keun sonsil eul boge doelila
27|6|geudaeneun jihyewa jisig-eulo chungmanhasin bun-eulobuteo kkulan-eul gyesibadge doeeossnola
27|7|bola mosega geuui gajog-ege malhagileul naega bul-eul boass-euna so sig-eul deudgo ogeona bolkkoch-eul gajyeowa neohuileul ttatteushage hae jugessnola

27|8|geuga bul-i issneun gos-e gass-eul ttae soliga deullyeowass-euni bulsog-e iss neun jawa geu jubyeon-e issneun jadeul-e ge chugbog-i iss-eul geos-ila geuleomeulo man-yuui junim-isin hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo
27|9|moseya naega balo gwonneung-gwa ji hyelo chungmanhan hananim-ila

27|10|ije neoui jipang-ileul deonjyeola geuttae geugeos-i machi baemcheoleom umjig-i neun geos-eul boass-eumae dwilo dol-aseo dol aboji ani hani moseya dulyeowo haji malla sillo seonjijadeul-eun nae ap eseo dulyeowo haji anhnola
27|11|jalmos-eul jeojileun hu balo seonhaeng-eulo gap-eumhaneun janeun je-oesikigeoneul sil lo naneun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhanila

27|12|moseya ne son-eul jumeonie neoh eun hu ppaenaeeobola eollug han jeom eobs neun saehayan son-i doeeo naolila i geos-eun nega palaowa geuui baegseong-e ge boyeo jul ahobgaji yejeung gaun de dul-ila sillo geudeul-eun joemanh-eun baegseongdeul-ila
27|13|hananim-ui bunmyeonghan yejeung-i geudeul-ege ileuleoss-eul ttae igeos-eun bunmyeonghan masul-ila geudeul-i malhadeola
27|14|geudeul-eun geugeos-eul ma-eumsog-e jin sil-ilago injeonghamyeonseodo bul-uiwa geo man ttaemun-e ileul bujeonghago iss-euni joeag-eul jeojileun jadeul-ui jongmal-i eo tteoham-eul bola
27|15|hananim-i dawisgwa sollomon-ege jihyeleul jumae geudeul-i malhagil mid-eum i manh-eun geubun-ui jongdeulboda jeohuie ge eunhyeleul deohayeo jusin hananimkke gamsaleul deulinaida
27|16|sollomon-i dawis-eul sangsoghago malhagil baegseongdeul-iyeo ulineun saedeul-ui mal-eul baewoss-eumyeo modeun eunhyeleul bad-ass euni igeos-eun bunmyeonghan hananim-eulobu teoui eunhyela
27|17|yeongmawa ingangwa saedeul-ui muli ga sollomon ap-e daeyeol-eul jiyeo gaggag byeolgaeui jibdan-eul guseonghayeossnola

27|18|geudeul-i gaemiui gyegog-e ileu leoss-eul ttae hanmaliui gaemiga malhagil gaemideul-a sollomongwa geuui gundaega kkaedadji moshago ulideul-eul balb-a jug iljido moleuni ulideul geojujilo deul-eogaja hadeola

27|19|sollomon-eun gaemiui mal-e us-eum eul teoteulimyeo malhagil juyeo jeowa jeo ui bumo-ege bepul-eo jun dangsiui eunhyee gamsahadolog heoyonghayeo jusoseodangsinkkeseo jeolo hayeogeum gippeohaneun seonhaeng-eul hadolog hayeo jusoseo dangsin ui eunhyeloseo dangsin-ui seongsilhan jongdeul jung-ui han jong-i doege hasoseo
27|20|geuga saedeul-eul bulleomoa malha gil odisaega boiji anhneunde geudo yeogie oji anhneun ja jung-ui hanagaaninyo
27|21|geuga man-il bunmyeonghi oji a nihan iyuleul jesihaji anhneundamyeon eomhage daseulyeo geuleul jug-ilila
27|22|geuneun eolmadoeji anh-a dol-awa malhagil jeoneun dangsindeul-i moleuneun geos eul algo issseubnida sabalobuteo jung yohan sosig-eul dangsinkke gajyeowassseubnida
27|23|jeoneun geugos-eseo geudeul wie gunlimhago issneun han yeoseong-eul balgyeonhaessneun de geunyeoegeneun modeun geos-i iss-eossgo widaehan ogjwado gajigo issseubnida

27|24|jeoneun geunyeowa geunyeoui baegseongdeul i hananim oee taeyang-eul sungbaehago iss-eum-eul al-assseubnida satandeul-eun geudeul-ui haeng-wileul geuleoldeushage boyeo geudeul lo hayeogeum jinliui gil-eul beos-eonage haess-euni geudeul-eun jigeum indodoeji mos hago issseubnida

27|25|geudeul-eun olh-eun gil-eseo beos-eona haneulgwa ttang-wie gamchueojin geos-e bich eul bichusigo gamchuneun geosgwa deuleonae neun modeun geos-eul algogyesineun hananim eul gyeongbaehaji ani habnida
27|26|geubun-eun widaehan gwonjaui junim isin hananim-eulo geubun oeeneun sin i eobs-seubnida
27|27|sollomon-i malhagil nega sasil eul malhaessneunji animyeon geojismal-eul haess neunji ulineun alge doelila
27|28|naui i seosin-eul gajigo gaseogeudeul-ege jeonhago jamsi mom-eul sumgi eo geudeul-i mueola eungdabhaneunji gi dalyeo bola
27|29|geu yeowang-i malhagil jogjangdeul-a naege gogwihan han seosin-i wassnola
27|30|geugeos-eun sollomon-eulobuteo on geos-eulo da-eumgwa gat-eumae jabilousigo jaaelousin hananim-ui ileum-eulo
27|31|na-e daehanghayeo omanhaji mal go sunjonghayeo naegelo ola
27|32|geunyeoga malhagil jogjangdeul-iyeo i il-e gwanhayeo jo-eonhae jusiyo neohuiga cham-yeohaji anhgoneun i il-eul gyeoljeonghaji moshagessso hani
27|33|geudeul-i daedabhagil jeohuiegeneunhimgwa yongmaeng-i issnaida myeonglyeonghasil geos-eul suggohayeo jusoseo
27|34|geunyeoga malhagil bola wangdeul-i han do-eub-e deul-eogal ttaeneun geu go-eul-eulpagoehago geu go-eul baegseongdeul-eul bicheon hage hanani geudeuldo geuleohalila
27|35|geuleomeulo naega geudeul-ege ha naui seonmul-eul bonaelini sasindeul-i eotteon eungdab-eul gajigo oneunji gida lyeo boja

27|36|geu sasin-i omae sollomon-i geudeul-ege malhagil neohuineun naege jaemul eul julyeohaneunyo hananimkkeseo naege jusin geos-i geubunkkeseo neohuiege jun geosboda na-eunila seonmul-eul mankkigha neun geos-eun naega anila neohuinila
27|37|dol-agala ulineun geudeul-i dae jeoghal su eobsneun gundaeleul ikkeulgo gaseogeugos-eulobuteo geudeul-eul chubanghalini geudeul-eun bulmyeong-yeseuleoun gul-yog-eul masbolila
27|38|geuga malhagil jogjangdeul-iyeo geu deul-i naege gwisunhayeo ogi jeon-e neohui jung-e nuga geu yeowang-ui ogjwaleul naege gajyeool su issneunyo
27|39|yeongma gaunde-ui han yojeong-i daedabhagil dangsinkkeseo jalileul il-eoseogi jeon-e jega geugeos-eul gajyeoogessna ida sillo jeoneun him-i ganghani mid-eojusoseo

27|40|seongseoui jisig-i pungbuhan jaga malhagil dangsin-i nunkkamjjag hal saie geugeos-eul gajyeoogessseubnida balo geuttaesollomon-eun geugeos-i jagigyeot-e iss-eum-eulbogoseo malhagil igeos-eun nae junim-ui eunhyelosseo ineun naega gamsahago iss neunji eunhyeleul mang-gaghago issneunji si heomhalyeo hasim-ila nugudeun gamsahaneunjaneun jasin-ui yeonghon-e gamsahaneun ja imyeo eunhyeleul mang-gaghaneun janeun hana nim-ui eunhyeleul geoyeoghaneun jaigeoneul sillo naui junim-eun pung-yowa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
27|41|geuga malhagil geunyeoleul wihae geunyeoui ogjwaleul byeongyeonghala ulineun geunyeoga olh-eun gillo indodoeneunji a nimyeon indodoeji anihanji al su issnola

27|42|yeowang-i wass-eul ttae igeos-i dangsin-ui ogjwaibnikka lago mul-euni geuwa biseushabnida lago geunyeoga daedabhamaegeunyeoboda apseo jihyega buyeodoeeo ulineun hananimkke sunjonghago iss-eossseubnida lago sollomon-i malhayeossdeola
27|43|geunyeoga hananim oee usang-eul sungbaehan geos-i geunyeoleul banghwangke haess-eu ni sillo geunyeoneun bulsinja gaunde iss-eossnola

27|44|geunyeoege gung-gwol-e deul-eogala malhani gungjeon-eul bon geunyeoga geugeos-eul yeonmos-ila saeng-gaghayeo geunyeoui chimaleulgeod-eo ollimae sollomon-i igeos-eun yu lilo pyeongtanhage mandeun gungjeon-ila mal hani geunyeoga malhagil juyeo sillo jega joeleul jieossnaida jeoneun sollomon gwa deobul-eo man-yuui ju-isin hananim kke gwiuihanaida
27|45|geuhu hananim-eun samudeuege geuui hyeongje salleleul bonae hananim-eul gyeongbaehala hani geudeul-eun dupaelo na nueo ssaum-eul hayeossdeola

27|46|ittae geuga malhagil baegseongdeul-i yeo eoihayeo seon-eul haenghaji ani hago ag-eul seodulleo haenghalyeo haneunyo neohuiga hananimkke yongseoleul bindamyeon neo huiga eunhyeleul bad-eul su iss-eulila

27|47|geudeul-i malhagil ulineun neowa hamkkehago issneun salamdeullo malmiam a bulhaeng-eul danghago issdoda hani geuga malhagil neohuiga bulhaenghan iyuneunhananimkke issnani neohuineun siheom-eul badgo issnola
27|48|geuleonde jisang-e haeag-eul peoteu ligo gaeseonhaji ani han aheub salam

27|49|geudeul-eun hananimkke maengsehayeo malhayeossdeola ulineun sallewa geuui gajog-eul bamjung-e salhaehago geuui bo hoja-egeneun ulineun geuui gajog-i pisaldanghan geos-eul boji moshaessseubnida sillo ulineun jeongjighan jadeul-ibnida malhalila
27|50|geudeul-eun gongmohago eummoleul kkumyeossjiman hananim-eun gyehoeg-eul sewossnolageuleona geudeul-eun alji moshayeossdeola
27|51|geudeul eummoui gyeolgwaga eotteohaessneunyo bola sillo hananim-eun geudeulgwa geuui baegseong moduleul myeolmangsikyeossnola
27|52|igeosdeul-i pyeheodoen geudeul-ui jib deul-igeoneul ineun geudeul-ui joe ttaemun-i la sillo geu an-eneun jihyega issneun baegseong-eul wihan yejeung-i issnola
27|53|hananim-eun mid-eum-eul gajgo hana nim-eul dulyeowohaneun ideul-eul guhaessnola
27|54|los-eul han seonjijalo bonaeni geu ga geuui baegseong-ege malhagil neohuineun neohuiga jikyeobomyeonseo joeleul beomhaneunyo
27|55|neohuineun yeojaga anin namjadeul ege seong-yog-eul gajneunyo sillo neohuineun mujihan baegseongdeul-ila

27|56|geuleona geuui baegseong-eun ie dae dab-eul moshago daman los-ui chujongjadeul eul dangsin-ui go-eul-eseo chubanghaeya doe nani sillo geudeul-eun sungyeolkoja haneun salamdeul-ibnida lago malhaess-eul ppun-ila
27|57|hananim-eun geuwa geuui chujongja deul-eul guhayeoss-euna geuui bu-in-eun je oehayeo beol-eul naelyeossnola
27|58|hananim-eun geudeul wie dol-ubag eul naelyeoss-euni gyeong-gobad-eun jadeul-ege-ui dol-ubag-eun bulhaeng-ieossnola
27|59|illeogalodoe hananimkke chanmileul deulimyeo geubun-i seontaeghan geubun-ui jong-ege pyeong-an-eul deulimyeo hananim-eun geudeul i sungbaehan usangboda hullyunghasinila

27|60|geubun-eun cheonjileul changjohasigo haneullobuteo bileul naelyeojusin bun-isi myeo i biloseo jeong-won-eul aleumdabgo mu seonghage hamyeo geu an-e namuleul jala ge haneun geos-eun neohuiga anila hana nim oee daleun sin-i iss-eul su issneu nyo geuleona geudeul-eun beos-eonan baegseongdeul ila

27|61|daejileul ansigcheolo hayeo jusi go geu an-e gangdeul-eul dusyeoss-eumyeo geogie umjig-iji anhneun san-eul se-usigo gang-gwa bada saileul dusin bun-i nu gu-inyo hananim oee daleun sin-i iss-eul su issdan mal-inyo geudeul daedasuneun-alji moshadeola

27|62|pil-yohanjaga buleul ttae ie daedabhasineun bun-i nugu-isimyeo saag-euljegeohayeojusa geudaedeul-eul daejiwiui hugyejalo hayeojusin bun-i nugu-inyohananim oee daleun sin-i iss-eul su issneunyo geuleondedo neohuineun suggohajianhneunyo

27|63|yugjiwa badaui eodum sog-eulo buteo geudaedeul-eul indohayeo jusin bun i nugu-imyeo geubun-ui eunhyeleul yego hayeo juneun balam-eul bonaejusin bun-eun nugu-inyo hananim oee daleun sin-i iss-eul su issneunyo hananim-eun geudeul-i sungbaehaneun modeun geos wie gyesinila

27|64|changjoleul hasigo geuhu changjoleul geodeubhasimyeo haneulgwa ttang-eulobuteo geudaedeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jusin bun eun nugu-inyo hananim oee daleun sin-i iss-eul su issneunyo illeogalodoe neohuiga jinsilhan jadeul-ilamyeon neohuiui jeung-geoleul ileuge hala
27|65|illeogalodoe hananim oeeneun haneulgwa ttang saie issneun bimil-eul aneun ja eobs-eumyeo ttohan jug-eun hu geudeul i eonje buhwaldoeneunji aneun ja eobsnola
27|66|naesee daehan geudeul-ui jisig-eun cheonbaghayeo geudeul-eun uisimhal geos-igeoneul geudeul-eun geue gwanhayeo jangnim-ila hani
27|67|bulsinjadeul-i malhagil uliwa uliui seonjodeul-i heulg-i doen hu dasi buhwal doendan mal-inyo
27|68|uliwa uli seonjodeul ijeon-e do i yagsog-i iss-eossjiman igeos-eun yes seonjodeul-ui jeonseol-e bulgwahadoda
27|69|illeogalodoe daeji wileul yeohaeng hamyeonseo joeindeul-ui malloga eotteohaessneun ga salpyeobola
27|70|geudeul-e daehayeo seulpeohaji mal go geudeul-ui eummo-e daehayeo goelowo hajido malla
27|71|geuttae geudeul-i malhalila neohui ga jinsilhan jadeul-ilamyeon eonje iyagsog-i dolaehaneunyo
27|72|illeogalodoe neohuiga seodulleo guhaneun geos-ui ilbuga teohuiege do laehaessneunjido moleul il-ila
27|73|sillo geudaeui junim-eun ingan-eul wihan eunhyelo chungmanhasina geudeul da suneun gamsahal jul moleudeola
27|74|geudaeui junimkkeseoneun geudeul-ui ma-eum-i gamchuneun geosgwa natanaeneun geos do asigo gyesigeoneul
27|75|haneulgwa ttang wie sumgyeojin geos-i eobs-eudoe geugeos-eun bunmyeonghi seongseoe gi logdoeeo issnola
27|76|sillo i kkulan-eun uigyeon-eul dallihago issneun daedasu iseula-el jason e gwanhayeo yaegihago iss-eumyeo
27|77|sillo igeos-eun midneun jadeul-eul wi han gil-iyo eunhaela
27|78|sillo junimkkeseoneun geudeul-eul geu bun-ui myeonglyeong-eulosseo pangyeolhasini geubun eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
27|79|hananimkke uijihala geudaega balo bunmyeonghan jinliui gil-wie issno la
27|80|geudaeneun jug-eunjalo hayeogeum deud ge hal su eobs-eumyeo gwimeogeolilo hayeo geum buleum-eul deudge hal su eobsnani i deul-eun balo jinlileul oemyeonhaneun jadeul ila
27|81|geudaeneun geudeul-ui joeag-eulo jang nim-i doen geudeul-eul wihan annaejado doel su eobs-eumyeo hananim-ui mal-eul midneun mu seullim oeeneun amudo deudge hal su eobsnola
27|82|geudeul wie malsseum-i ihaengdoel ttae daejilobuteo yasuleul kkeul-eonaeeo geu jimseung-eulohayeo hananim-ui malsseum-eul midji anihaessdeon geudeul-eul jeojuhage halila
27|83|geunal hananim-eun modeun baegseong-eu lobuteo geubun-ui malsseum-eul bujeonghan ja deul-eul moige hani geudeul-eun jul-eul seo ge doelila
27|84|geudeul-i simpandae wie oleul ttaegeubunkkeseo malsseumhasilini neohuineun aljido moshamyeonseo naui mal-eul bujeonghaess neunyo animyeon algo iss-eossneunyo
27|85|joejieun geudeul wie pangyeol-i iss-eul geos-ila geuttae geudeul-eun malmun-eul yeolji moshalila

27|86|bam-euldueo geudeullo hayeogeum hyu sig-eul chwihage hago naj-eul dueo bich-iissge hayeoss-eum-eul geudeul-eun alji mosha neunyo sillo geu an-eneun midneun baegseongdeul-eul wihan yejung-i issnola

27|87|napal-i ullineun geunal-eul sang-gi sikiljini haneulgwa ttang wie issneun modeun geosdeul-i gongpo-e hoebssaige doeli la geuleona hananim-ui tteus-eul dusyeossdeon jadeul-eun je-oedoenani geudeul moduneun gyeomsonhage geubun-ege oneunila

27|88|geudaega sandeul-eul bomae gyeongoha dago saeng-gaghana geugeos-eun guleum-i ji nagadeus salajigeoneul geugeos-eun modeun geos-eul jugwanhasineun hananim-ui jagpum-ila sillo geubun-eun neohuideul-i haenghaneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinola
27|89|seon-eul haenghan janeun nugudeun geu geos-eulo bosang-eul bad-eumyeo geunal-ui gong polobuteo anjeonhadoe
27|90|ag-eul jeojileun janeun nugudeun geudeul-ui eolgul-i bulsog-e meomulge doe nani neohuiga jeojileun geos oee bosang eul badneunda saeng-gaghaneunyo

27|91|naneun i dosileul seong-yeog-eulo hayeo jusin junimman-eul gyeongbaehala myeong lyeongbad-ass-euni modeun geos-eun geubun-ui gwon neung an-e issnola ttohan naneun hananim kke sunjonghaneun jaga doelaneun myeonglyeong-eul bad-assnola

27|92|kkulan-eul nangsonghadolog myeonglyeong bad ass-euni olh-eun gil-eul ganeun janeun jagi jasin-eul wihae ganeun jaimyeo banghwangha neun jaga issdamyeon illeogalodoe naega balo geudeul-eul wihan gyeong-gojala
27|93|illeogalodoe hananimkke gamsahala geubun-eun neohuiege yejung-eul boyeo jusilini god neohuiga alge doelila junimkkeseoneun neohuiga haenghago issneun modeun geos-eul moleuneun bun-i aninola
